name: Benbo Quest II: BenboWARS
description:

tHE YEAR IS 2022...

...the world enter a era of unprecidented peace and prosperity....everything is but videogames have turned into shit there are too many games and they are all bad BUT SUDDENTLY THERE OPENED A PORTAL OF SKELETON UNIVERSE...........UNKNOWN REASONS............................

ppl all 9over the platnet become SKELETON......

THE GOMERMENT HAS TAKEN OVER BY SKELETON

SKELETON ARMY INVASION ARMY INVADING THE PLANET THRU THE SKELETON PORTAL....

ARMIES IN THE STREET GOVEMENT LOCKDOWN THE PLANERY TAKEOVER PLAN 9000 YEARS IN THE MAKING...

EVIL SKELETHEAD MAN RULER OF THE WORLD AND SECRET SHADOWLY FIGURES IN THE BACK GROUND PULLING THE STRING......

Indie Game Protagonist and Anime Girl featured in this video indie game the Only one left standing after the Invasion Of Skeletons. Somehow, Immune to Skeletons...Defend your House and go on the Epicest Benbo Adventure to return the everything to Normal.
